tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ConflictResolution (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    legal_document TEXT,
    agreement TEXT,
    case_study TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE CaseStudies (
    case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name STRING,
    case_description STRING,
    related_documents ARRAY<UUID>,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE agreements (
    agreement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agreement_type VARCHAR(50),
    party1_id UUID,
    party2_id UUID,
    agreement_date DATE
);
